/>
VIII.iii.2.A.1.a
.
Action to Take When Only a Positive Tuberculin Reaction Is Claimed
If a claim is submitted for
only
a positive tuberculin reaction, refer the claim to the rating activity for a determination as to whether or not a disability is present.
Reference
:  For more information on medical treatment for a positive tuberculin reaction, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 3.E
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) for Positive Tuberculin Reactions
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
